bio:
Feifei Liu is a Language Lecturer of the Chinese Language Program at NYU Shanghai, She did an M.A. at East China Normal University in Teaching Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages.

Her primary research interests lie in the broad areas of language teaching pedagogies, including classroom activities, classroom management, and methodologies of teaching phonology, grammar, and Chinese Characters. She was the interviewer and trainer of the Chinese Volunteer Teachers Program.

Prior to join in NYU Shanghai, she used to teach at East China Normal University (Shanghai), China Institute (New York), and SMIC Private School (Shanghai).
